NK100(the)016:1: // gtum mo'i gdams ngag don bzhi ma bzhugs so //
NK100(the)016:2: bdud rtsi nyi ma dpag bsam rin chen ltar /
NK100(the)016:3: 'gro ba kun gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal /
NK100(the)016:4: dus gsum bla ma rnams dang dkon mchog gsum /
NK100(the)016:5: 'bral ba med par thugs rjes gzung du gsol /
NK100(the)016:6: 'dir rnal 'byor pa sgrub pa tshul bzhin du byed par 'dod pa rnams kyis /
NK100(the)016:7: lus lto rgyab kyi phyogs su ma song par bya ba phyir /
NK100(the)016:8: gtum mo'i gdams ngag nyams su blangs par bya ste /
NK100(the)016:9: de la gtum mo'i rigs 'di la mang du yod kyang /
NK100(the)016:10: 'dir phyi tshul khrims kyi gtum mo 'di la don gnyis ste /
NK100(the)016:11: yid ches shing lung pa btsun par bya ba'i phyir /
NK100(the)016:12: bla ma brgyud pa'i lo rgyus dang /
NK100(the)016:13: brgyud pa de ldan gyi gdams ngag dngos so //
NK100(the)016:14: rgyud pa'i lo rgyus la gsum /
NK100(the)016:17: gang zag snyan khungs kyi brgyud pa'o //
NK100(the)016:19: chos sku kun tu bzang pos /
NK100(the)016:20: longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' la gnang /
NK100(the)016:21: des sprul sku phyag na rdo rje la gnang /
NK100(the)016:25: dge slong ku ku ra dza la /
NK100(the)016:26: des sangs rgyas gsang ba la /
NK100(the)016:27: des dri med bshes gnyen la'o //
NK100(the)016:28: de yan chad ni rigs 'dzin gyi brgyud pa'o //
NK100(the)016:30: gnyags dz+ny+aa na ku ma ra la /
NK100(the)016:31: des sog po dpal gyi ye shes la /
NK100(the)016:32: des snubs sangs rgyas ye shes la /
NK100(the)016:33: des dar rje dpal gyi grags pa la /
NK100(the)016:34: des grub thob ldom bu ba la /
NK100(the)016:35: des bla ma a mes chen po la /
NK100(the)016:36: des dam pa chen po la /
NK100(the)016:37: des grub thob dbon rin la /
NK100(the)016:38: des jo gdan bsod nams bkra shis /
NK100(the)016:39: des dam pa byang chub bkra shis /
NK100(the)016:41: des rta rin chen dpal bzang po la gnang ba'o //
NK100(the)016:44: bla ma zwa lu pa chen po /
NK100(the)016:48: des rta'i ban rdo la gnang ngo //
NK100(the)016:49: brgyud pa gnyis pa de ldan gyi gdams ngag dngos ni /
NK100(the)016:50: gtum mo don bzhi'i gdams ngag bya ba yin pas /
NK100(the)016:52: bla ma byin brlabs kyi gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:54: tsan rda li rtsa ba'i gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:55: lta bsgom don gyi gtum mo'o //
NK100(the)016:57: bla ma byin rlabs kyi gtum mo zhugs pa dang /
NK100(the)016:60: chos sgo 'gyed pa'i mchod pa'i skabs su shes par bya'o //
NK100(the)016:61: gnyis pa bsgom pa dngos la gnyis te /
NK100(the)016:62: bla ma'i gdan rnam dag dang bcas pa bsam pa dang /
NK100(the)016:63: bla ma'i sku chos gsum ldan nam bzhi ldan du bsgom pa'o //
NK100(the)016:65: rang gi lus kyi spyi bo gtsug dang /
NK100(the)016:66: dpung pa g.yos g.yon gnyis te gsum du bam ljang khu re bsam /
NK100(the)016:67: de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad /
NK100(the)016:71: byang ljang dbus kyi lte ba mthing kha /
NK100(the)016:72: mtshams rnams mdzes tshon dang bcas pa bsam /
NK100(the)016:73: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dal gsum bsam /
NK100(the)016:74: de'i steng du a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dal gsum ste /
NK100(the)016:75: re re la rtseg tu bsgom mo //
NK100(the)016:76: 'o na gdan gsum bsgoms pa la dgos pas ci yod zhe na /
NK100(the)016:77: dpung pa g.yas pa'i gdan gyis ni 'das pa'i bla ma rnams bzhug par brtson pa'i gnad yin te /
NK100(the)016:79: 'das pa'i bla ma rnams kyis 'das pa'i dus su
NK100(the)016:80: gdams ngag khyad par can 'di lta bu bstan pa
NK100(the)016:81: la brten nas / da ltar gyi bla ma rnams
NK100(the)016:82: kyis kyang gdams ngag khyad par can 'di lta bu
NK100(the)016:83: ston par 'gyur pa'i rten 'brel lam skal pa can
NK100(the)016:84: du 'gyur pa'i dgos pa yod pas na 'das pa'i
NK100(the)016:85: bla ma rnams bzhugs par mtshon dgos pa yin gsung
NK100(the)016:86: la brten nas / / dpung pa g.yon gyi gdan
NK100(the)016:87: ni ma 'ongs pa'i bla ma rnams bzhugs par mtshon
NK100(the)016:89: ma 'ongs pa'i bla ma rnams bzhugs par mtshon pas /
NK100(the)016:90: da ltar gyi bla ma rnams kyis kyang gdams ngag
NK100(the)016:91: khyad par can 'di lta bu bstan pa la brten
NK100(the)016:92: nas / ma 'ongs pa'i bla ma rnams kyis kyang
NK100(the)016:93: ma 'ongs pa'i dus ston pa'i byang chub kyi lam
NK100(the)016:94: gyi grogs su gdams ngag khyad par can 'di lta
NK100(the)016:96: skal pa bzang por 'gyur bas na /
NK100(the)016:97: ma 'ongs pa'i bla ma rnams pa bzhugs par mtshon dgos pa yin gsung /
NK100(the)016:98: spyi bo'i gtsug gi gdan ni /
NK100(the)016:99: rtsa ba'i bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bzhugs
NK100(the)016:100: pa'i gdan yin pas shin tu'ang bsgom dgos pa yin
NK100(the)016:101: gsung ngo // 'o na gdan gsum bsgoms pa la dgos pa 'dug te /
NK100(the)016:102: sum brtsegs la dgos pa ci yod snyam na /
NK100(the)016:103: pad ma ni 'dam na gnas kyang /
NK100(the)016:104: de'i skyon gyis ma gos pa ltar /
NK100(the)016:105: bla ma rnams kyang 'khor ba na gnas kyang /
NK100(the)016:106: de'i skyon gyis ma gos pas mtshon pa yin /
NK100(the)016:107: nyi mas ni bla ma rnams kyi thugs rgyud la /
NK100(the)016:108: shes rab stong pa spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral bar rtogs pa de mtshon pa yin /
NK100(the)016:109: zla bas ni bla ma rnams kyi thugs rgyud la
NK100(the)016:110: thabs ma 'gags pa'i snying rje chen po mnga' ba
NK100(the)016:112: nyi zla rtseg mas ni thabs shes rab zung du 'brel ba mtshon pa yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:113: gnyis pa bla ma'i sku chos sku gsum ldan nam bzhi ldan du bsgom pa ni /
NK100(the)016:114: rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug gi gdan sum rtseg gi steng du /
NK100(the)016:115: chos sku kun tu bzang po nas rtsa ba'i bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams /
NK100(the)016:116: sku rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos bdun dang ldan zhing /
NK100(the)016:117: thugs ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa sku reg bya shin tu tsha ste /
NK100(the)016:118: dper na lcags bsregs pa lta bu /
NK100(the)016:119: sku lcid shin tu che ste lcags kyi pho bang lta bu /
NK100(the)016:120: sku gzi brjid shin tu che ste gzi ldan nyi ma'i snying po lta bur bsgom mo //
NK100(the)016:121: 'o na sku chos gsum ldan nam bzhi ldan lta
NK100(the)016:122: bu bsgoms pa la dgos pa ci yod ce na
NK100(the)016:124: bla ma rnams sku rnam snang gi chos bdun dang /
NK100(the)016:125: thugs ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs par bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:126: slob ma rnams la lta bsgom don gyi gtum mo'i
NK100(the)016:127: skabs su ting 'dzin gyi rtogs pas khyad par can
NK100(the)016:128: rgyud la skye ba'i dgos pa'am rten 'brel yod /
NK100(the)016:129: sku reg bya shin tu tshar bar bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:130: tsan d+ha li rtsa ba'i gtum ma'i skabs su gtum
NK100(the)016:131: mo'i bde drod khyad par can rgyud la skye ba'i
NK100(the)016:133: sku lcid shin tu che bar bsgoms pas ting nge
NK100(the)016:134: 'dzin gyi bde drod khyad par can skyes pa mi
NK100(the)016:136: de brten par 'gyur ba'i rten 'brel lam dgos pa yod /
NK100(the)016:137: sku gzi brjid shin tu che bar bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:138: bsgoms mkhas la phyi nang gi bar chad kyi mi
NK100(the)016:139: tshugs par 'gyur pa'i dgos pa'am rten 'brel yod gsung
NK100(the)016:140: ngo // de ltar chos sku kun tu bzang po nas /
NK100(the)016:141: rtsa ba'i bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa rnams chos gsum ldan nam bzhi ldan du bsgom /
NK100(the)016:142: mos gus drag pos gsol ba snying gi dkyil nas gdab /
NK100(the)016:143: rtsa ba dang brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bla ma
NK100(the)016:144: dam pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams
NK100(the)016:146: rtogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin rgyud la skye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK100(the)016:147: zhes gsol ba lan gsum du btab pas /
NK100(the)016:148: bla ma rnams thugs rje skyes te /
NK100(the)016:149: kun tu bzang po 'od du zhu nas longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' la thim /
NK100(the)016:150: longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' 'od du zhu nas /
NK100(the)016:151: rims pa bzhin du rtsa ba'i bla ma'i bar du thim pas /
NK100(the)016:152: bla ma rnams re re zhing ting nge 'dzin dang
NK100(the)016:153: rtogs pa je brtan je brtan reg bya je tsha
NK100(the)016:154: sku ljid je che sku gzi brjid cher 'gyur par
NK100(the)016:155: bsgom mo // rtsa ba'i bla ma la'ang mos gus drag pos gsol ba btab te /
NK100(the)016:156: rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa thugs rje chen po ldan pa /
NK100(the)016:157: bdag la bde drod dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rtogs
NK100(the)016:158: pa khyad par can rgyud la skye bar byin gyis
NK100(the)016:159: brlab tu gsol / zhes gsol ba lan gsum du btab pas /
NK100(the)016:160: rtsa ba'i bla ma rnams thugs rje skyes te /
NK100(the)016:161: 'od du zhu ste rang gi spyi bo na mar thims pas /
NK100(the)016:162: lus phyi nang med pa thams cad ngo bo me
NK100(the)016:163: la rnam pa 'od kyi rnam pa can du dmar
NK100(the)016:164: me gyis gang zhing tsha lam lam song bar bsgom
NK100(the)016:165: ste / dpe'i nang du lugs blugs pa bzhin du bsam mo //
NK100(the)016:166: de nas dmigs pa me la gtad nas rlung kha sbyar lan bdun gzung ngo //
NK100(the)016:167: 'khor lo dang ste ma ma gtogs pa de bas rlung mang pa mi 'dzin te /
NK100(the)016:168: gdams ngag 'di yi lugs kyis rlung gtso bor mi byed /
NK100(the)016:169: dmigs pa gtso che ba yin pas /
NK100(the)016:170: des na dus rgyun du dmigs pa bsgom pa gal che gsung /
NK100(the)016:171: yang dmigs pa bsgom pa skyo na ste ma bskul
NK100(the)016:172: ba rlung bya ba yin pas rlung kha sbyar bdun
NK100(the)016:174: de bas mang ba mi 'dzin par dmigs pa kho na bsgoms te /
NK100(the)016:175: 'og ma thams cad la'ang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK100(the)016:176: de ltar bsgoms pas dbang po rab la /
NK100(the)016:177: bla ma'i byin brlabs kyi gtum mo la bsten nas /
NK100(the)016:178: byin rlabs kyi bde drod chen po skye ba yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:179: bla ma byin rlabs kyi gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:181: don gnyis pa 'byung ba rang gtum mo ni /
NK100(the)016:182: 'byung ba rnam pa lnga mtshan nyid dang bcas pa bsgoms te /
NK100(the)016:187: nam mkha' kun gyi go 'byed pa'o //
NK100(the)016:192: de lta bu'i 'byung ba lnga po de phyi na yod par ma zad /
NK100(the)016:193: nang rang gi lus la'ang yod pas /
NK100(the)016:195: ji ltar lus la gnas de bzhin //
NK100(the)016:201: nang gi khang pa nam mkha' yin pas /
NK100(the)016:202: rang gi lus la dang po nas gnas pa'i don gyis na 'byung pa rong po zhes bya'o //
NK100(the)016:203: de'i gtum mo bsgom pa ni 'byung ba lnga'i rten 'brel bsgrigs nas bsgom pa yin te /
NK100(the)016:204: de la phyi'i rten 'brel bsgrigs na /
NK100(the)016:205: sbud pa la sogs pas rlung bud pas thab khung gi me 'bar /
NK100(the)016:206: me 'bar bas phrul ba'i chu khol nas /
NK100(the)016:207: sra ba pa'i khams sha dang rus pa la sogs pa tshes par byed pa'i /
NK100(the)016:208: des de bzhin du nang gi rlung la stems pas gtum mo'i bde drod skyes /
NK100(the)016:209: drod skyes pa dang chu ser la sogs pa khol /
NK100(the)016:210: de khol bas sha dang rus pa la sogs pa tshos shing 'thas par byas /
NK100(the)016:212: khams dang ma byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed /
NK100(the)016:213: de rgyas pas gtum mo'i bde drod dang ting nge
NK100(the)016:214: 'dzin gyi rtogs pas rgyud la skye bar 'gyur bas
NK100(the)016:215: / de ltar shes par byas nas bsgom pa dngos ni /
NK100(the)016:216: rang gi lus 'di shel dmar po'i mchod rten bang rim gsum pa /
NK100(the)016:217: phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba /
NK100(the)016:218: nang nas bltas na phyi gsal ba /
NK100(the)016:219: ngo bo me la rnam pa shel dmar po'i mchod
NK100(the)016:220: rten phyi nang thams cad 'od dang drod kyis gang
NK100(the)016:221: ba la dmigs pa gzung nas rlung kha sbyar lan
NK100(the)016:223: de ltar bsgoms pas dbang po 'bring la brten nas
NK100(the)016:224: kyang gtum mo'i bde drod chen po skye zhing sa
NK100(the)016:225: la brtan pa'ii byed pa yod pas /
NK100(the)016:226: bde drod skyes pa mi nyams shing brten par 'gyur gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:228: iti&a&a&a spyi don gsum pa tsan d+ha li rtsa ba'i gtum mo la gsum ste /
NK100(the)016:229: nang rang don gyi gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:230: phyi gzhan don gyi gtum mo'o //
NK100(the)016:232: rang don gyi gtum mo la bskor gsum ste /
NK100(the)016:233: nang me lce gzhung shing gi gtum mo deng /
NK100(the)016:234: bar stong gnyis me khyim gyi gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:235: phyi nyi ma ga'u kha sbyar gyi gtum mo'o //
NK100(the)016:239: dang po gzhung shing la dmigs pa bco lnga yod kyang /
NK100(the)016:240: gnad rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas rim par bzhin 'khrid par byed pa yin te /
NK100(the)016:241: de la bca' ba lus kyi gnad /
NK100(the)016:243: dmigs pa me yi gnad do //
NK100(the)016:244: dang po ni rkang pa me sgyed gzugs pa /
NK100(the)016:246: mgo bo ma phru gzugs pa ste /
NK100(the)016:247: lta khru gsum dgu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lus gnad zhes bya ba yin te /
NK100(the)016:248: lus gnad 'di la lta bus kyang gtum mo'i bde drod skye ba'i rten 'brel yod pa yin gsung /
NK100(the)016:249: gnyis pa bud pa rlung gi gnad ni rlung lan gsum bus te /
NK100(the)016:250: dang po bus pas tshe 'khor ba thog ma med
NK100(the)016:251: pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sngon dmar
NK100(the)016:252: gyi tshul du / sna la sogs pa'i bu ga
NK100(the)016:253: dang ba spu'i bu ga na tshur sangs kyis don
NK100(the)016:254: pas sdig sgrib thams cad dag pas bsam /
NK100(the)016:255: gnyis pa nus pas tu lto dang ljan ljin la sogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas don par bsam /
NK100(the)016:256: gsum pa nus pas lus kyi sha dang rus pa
NK100(the)016:257: la sogs pa thams cad sangs kyi don nas lus
NK100(the)016:258: rkyang stong nus pa lta bur song par bsam mo
NK100(the)016:259: // de nas lung kha sbyar gcig gzung pas /
NK100(the)016:260: de bas kyang dkar la srab pa nag nog med pa /
NK100(the)016:261: stong ra dkar po khru ma phus btab pa lta bur bsam mo //
NK100(the)016:262: gsum la dmigs pa me'i gnad don ni /
NK100(the)016:263: stong ra rkang pa sgye mo khung gi nag gnyis
NK100(the)016:264: su yi ge ram tshon gang pa la mdog dmar
NK100(the)016:265: ste ma tshal lcog la ma lta bu /
NK100(the)016:266: reg bya tsha ste dus mtha'i me lta bu la dmigs pa gtad nas /
NK100(the)016:267: rlung gi ste me 'di nas 'dzin pas rlung gi ste ma dang bcas pa gzung nas /
NK100(the)016:268: snga bzhin lan bdun tsam bsgoms te stong ra mo'i sa bon bsgom pa'i gtum mo'o //
NK100(the)016:269: yang lus gnad gong dang 'dra ba la /
NK100(the)016:270: dmigs pa gong ma gong ma la 'og ma 'og mas gnod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK100(the)016:271: yang lung gzung nas bsgom pas ram gyi ma bzod
NK100(the)016:272: par ram gyi rtse mo nas me mtshan nyid bzhi
NK100(the)016:273: ldan kha dog dmar ste mtshal lcog la ma lta
NK100(the)016:274: bu reg bya shin tu tsha ste reg bya reg
NK100(the)016:276: bltas pas kyang med pa dang /
NK100(the)016:277: skal pa 'jig pa'i me lta bu /
NK100(the)016:278: ngo bo 'phra ste gro sog gi 'grin pa lta bu /
NK100(the)016:280: rtse mo g.yo ste mtshon cha gang tsam cig mar
NK100(the)016:281: me rlung gi bskyod pa bzhin du su ru ru
NK100(the)016:282: yod par bsgom / me mtshan nyid bzhi ldan des
NK100(the)016:283: stong ra'i nang thams cad 'od ngang gis khengs bar
NK100(the)016:284: yod par bsgom / bsgoms te / me lce lo su'i thad kar slob pa'i gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:285: de nas yang me lce gyen la then pas 'od
NK100(the)016:286: dang drod je che la song par bsgom pa thams
NK100(the)016:288: yang rlung ste ma dang gzung pas /
NK100(the)016:289: me lce stong ra'i byin pa sbom 'phra'i mtshams su sleb pa dang /
NK100(the)016:291: me lce yar la thon pas stong ra'i pus mor sleb pa dang /
NK100(the)016:292: de bzhin du me lce barla sbom 'phra'i mtshams dang /
NK100(the)016:293: me lce stong ra'i khog pa mthong pa dang /
NK100(the)016:294: me lce sor bzhi tsam ma phrad pa dang /
NK100(the)016:295: me lce rtse mo phrad pa'i gtum mo rnams rim pa bzhin du bsgoms te /
NK100(the)016:297: lus la ji ltar gnas rim bzhin //
NK100(the)016:299: gong 'og thams cad tu shes par bya'o //
NK100(the)016:300: skabs 'dir gags sol gyi gdams ngag dri ba dgod /
NK100(the)016:302: gags bsal thabs dang bcas pa bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
NK100(the)016:303: yang rlung stem dang bcas pa sngar bzhin gzung nas bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:304: me lce gnyis gcig tu gyur te sgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:305: yi ge ram dmar po mtshon gang pa rtse mo
NK100(the)016:306: me lce tshon gang g.yo ba dang bcas pa bsgom
NK100(the)016:307: pa dang / de bzhin du me lce lte bar slebs pa'i gtum mo ste /
NK100(the)016:309: dog pa'i gnas su phra ba ste //
NK100(the)016:310: yangs pa'i gnas su cung zad sbom //
NK100(the)016:312: me'i rkang dang me lce cung zad sbom par bsgom /
NK100(the)016:313: rtsa ba las 'gyur med ste ma 'dzin pa shin tu gces /
NK100(the)016:317: me ste rgya mtsho'i gting du sba /
NK100(the)016:318: me lce ri rab kyi logs la sbar /
NK100(the)016:320: gzhung shing rtse sprad pa'i man ngag go //
NK100(the)016:321: yang rlung ste ma dang bcas pa bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:322: me lce snying khar slebs pa dang /
NK100(the)016:323: me lce brang khog tu slebs pa dang /
NK100(the)016:324: me sgra dang bcas pa slob mi dgos pa dang /
NK100(the)016:325: me lce 'grin pa'i gnas su sleb pa dang /
NK100(the)016:326: me lce spyi bor sleb par bsgoms pas /
NK100(the)016:327: stong ra'i phyi nang thams cad 'od dang drod kyis gang nas mi bzod pa tsam du gyur te /
NK100(the)016:328: drung na yod pa'i sa phyogs thams cad kyang tsha lam lam la song bar bsgoms te /
NK100(the)016:329: stod mo'i gtam mo yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
NK100(the)016:330: gnyis pa stong me khyim gyi gtum mo sgom pa gnyis /
NK100(the)016:331: du ba grib sal gyi gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:332: rdo rje me 'khor gyi gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:334: sngar bzhin bsgoms pas tsha grags nas stong ras kyang ma bzod par /
NK100(the)016:335: stong ra'i phyi nag thams cad kyang du ba chen po bun bun bun byung ste /
NK100(the)016:336: thog la phog /thog thams cad kyang tsha lam lam song /
NK100(the)016:337: thog nas mar la log ste /
NK100(the)016:338: stong ra'i phyi nang thams cad du ba'i tshub ma chen po gcig tu gyur /
NK100(the)016:339: ste lam gyi phyogs thams cad kyang tsha lam lam
NK100(the)016:340: song zhing du tshub tu song nas stong ra gang
NK100(the)016:341: gi kyang mi mthong bar bsgom te /
NK100(the)016:342: de lta bu thun gsum gsum tsam bsgoms na nyams
NK100(the)016:343: grib la sogs pa yod pa'i sa phyogs su phyin
NK100(the)016:344: kyang / nyams grib dang bdud la sogs pas mi tshugs par /
NK100(the)016:345: grub thob dbon rin gyi zhal nas /
NK100(the)016:346: myong stobs dang tshad mas grub pas /
NK100(the)016:347: srung ba'i grib dang 'khor lo chen mo 'di gsung /
NK100(the)016:348: gnyis pa rdo rje me ba khor gyi gtum mo
NK100(the)016:349: ni gzhung shing la rdo rje me lce'i 'khor lo
NK100(the)016:350: rdo rje rgya gram rtse mo bcu gnyis pa dang
NK100(the)016:351: bcas pa ngo bo me la rnam pa rdo /
NK100(the)016:352: rtse mo me lce shin tu g.yo' ba dang bcas pa /
NK100(the)016:353: tsha khyad bskal pa bsregs pa'i me lta bu bsgoms te /
NK100(the)016:354: rlung ste ma bcas pa gzung bas /
NK100(the)016:355: ste ma'i 'od zer gyis rdo yar la 'khor /
NK100(the)016:356: spyi bor me lce'i ngad kyis mar la 'khor bas /
NK100(the)016:357: gzhung shing rdo rje'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis phyi nang
NK100(the)016:358: thams cad tshig nas dmar lam rtser song par bsam
NK100(the)016:359: ste / gzhung shing thams cad rdo rje'i me lce'i
NK100(the)016:360: 'od kyis phyi nang thams cad tshig nas dmar lam
NK100(the)016:361: po bas phyogs thams cad rlangs phyur phyur ru yod
NK100(the)016:362: ste / pa / sa phyogs thams cad 'od dang
NK100(the)016:363: drod kyi gang nas mi tshugs par gur pa tsam
NK100(the)016:364: ste / pa / du bsgom mo // de ltar bsgooms pas /
NK100(the)016:365: gtum mo'i bde drod chen po skyes shing grang nad
NK100(the)016:366: dang glang thabs sogs pa'i pho ba'i nad thams cad
NK100(the)016:367: kyang thon par myong stobs kyis grub pa yin zhes
NK100(the)016:368: / grub thob dbon rin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:369: de la btsan thabs kyi gtum mo zhes kyang grags so //
NK100(the)016:370: gsum pa nyi ma ga'u kha sbyar gyi gtum mo la bzhi ste /
NK100(the)016:371: steng 'og nyi ma kha sbyar gyi gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:372: phyogs bzhi'i nyi ma kha sbyar gyi gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:373: dus rgyun du dmigs pa la gtad pa 'od zer 'du 'phro'i gtum mo dang /
NK100(the)016:374: gtum mo'i chos gos rnam gsum sbyin pa'o //
NK100(the)016:375: dang po steng 'og gi gtum mo ni /
NK100(the)016:376: steng 'og gnyis su yi ge ram dmar po bsam nas rlung ste ma dang bcas pa gzung nas /
NK100(the)016:377: ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dal phub chu tsam gnyis bsal /
NK100(the)016:378: gnyis pa phyogs bzhi'i ga'u kha sbyar ni /
NK100(the)016:379: 'dom re tsam gyi phyogs nas sngar ma bzhin yi ge ram dmar po re re bsam nas /
NK100(the)016:380: de nas rlung ste ma dang bcas pa gzung pas /
NK100(the)016:381: ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dal bzhir gyur ste /
NK100(the)016:385: me yis nang nas bsros pas /
NK100(the)016:386: stong ra'i phyi nang thams cad dang sa phyogs thams
NK100(the)016:387: cad kyang 'od dang drod kyis gang gis kyang mi
NK100(the)016:389: gsum pa dus rgyun du dmigs pa ma gtad pa 'od zer spro bsdus gtum mo'i ni /
NK100(the)016:390: nang gi me'i ste ma las 'od zer me'i tsha
NK100(the)016:391: tsha lta bu 'phros pas phyi'i nyi ma la phog
NK100(the)016:392: /nyi ma rnams las 'od 'phros te ma phog /de
NK100(the)016:393: bzhin du 'od zer phar 'phros tshur 'phros gyur pa
NK100(the)016:394: las / ste ma dang nyi ma'i bar thams cad
NK100(the)016:395: mi dang 'od zer du gyur nas thams cad tshal
NK100(the)016:397: de yang dus rgyun du zer ba ni khrid rdzogs kyi gting la dus rgyun du bsgom pa ni /
NK100(the)016:398: zhag re la dmigs pa gzhan rnams tshar re bsgoms pa'i gting la /
NK100(the)016:399: dus rgyun du 'di kho na bsgoms pa yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:400: bzhi pa chos gos rnam gsum byin gyis brlab pa ni gnyis las /
NK100(the)016:401: nub mo longs sku'i chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK100(the)016:402: nyin mo sprul sku'i chos gos byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK100(the)016:403: dang po longs sku'i chos gos byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK100(the)016:407: gnyis pa sprul sku'i chos gos ni /
NK100(the)016:411: de rnams byin rlabs bla ma'i gsung las byon pa bzhin bya'o //
NK100(the)016:413: gzhan don gyi gtum mo ni /
NK100(the)016:414: rang gcig pu gtum mo bde drod dang ldan pas
NK100(the)016:415: mi chog /gzhan thams cad kyang gtum mo'i bde drod
NK100(the)016:416: dang ldan zhing / theg pa chen po'i snod tu rung par byed dgos pas /
NK100(the)016:417: yang rlung ste ma dang bcas pa bzung pas /
NK100(the)016:418: ste ma la ye shes kyi me 'bar nas stong ra'i nang thams cad gang nas /
NK100(the)016:419: de nas rim bzhin stong ra'i phyi nang nye bar tshun chad dang khang pa'i nang mtshams dang /
NK100(the)016:420: 'dzam bu'i gling dang stong gsum thams cad /
NK100(the)016:421: gtum mo ye shes kyi me cig gis gang nas
NK100(the)016:422: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi grangs nad
NK100(the)016:423: thams cad ni ye shes kyi mes dro bar gyur
NK100(the)016:424: / tshad nad thams cad ni ye shes kyi mes bsil bar gyur te /
NK100(the)016:425: sems can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal dang bral nas
NK100(the)016:426: gtum mo'i bde drod khyad par can dang ldan zhing
NK100(the)016:427: theg pa chen po'i rigs can sha stag tu gyur
NK100(the)016:428: par bsgom mo // de ltar bsgoms na rtsa gnas
NK100(the)016:429: ngan pa rnams kyang gtum mo'i bde drod chen po
NK100(the)016:431: tsan d+ha li rtsa ba'i gtum mo //
NK100(the)016:433: spyi don bzhi pa lta bsgon don gyi gtum mo la gnyis /
NK100(the)016:437: lta ba bsgom pa spyod pa'o //
NK100(the)016:438: lta ba ni rang bzhin spros bral lhun grub snang pa sgyu ma lhun grub /
NK100(the)016:439: mtshan nyid rang rig lhun grub /
NK100(the)016:440: mtshan nyid gsum ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhis lta ba ngo sprod /
NK100(the)016:442: gyin rda gsum gyis lta ba nyams su blang /
NK100(the)016:444: shes rab dang mthun pa'i spyod pa /
NK100(the)016:445: thabs dang mthun pa'i spyod pa /
NK100(the)016:447: dang po ni chos nyid kyis ngang du gang yang ma dmigs par spyad /
NK100(the)016:448: gnyis pa thabs kyi spyod pa ni /
NK100(the)016:449: thabs ma 'gags pa'i dus spang blang dgag bsgrub dang bral bar spyad /
NK100(the)016:450: sgo gsum rgyun gyi spyod pa ni sems can gyi
NK100(the)016:451: don du 'gyur na chos spyod bcu'i spros pa'ang mi
NK100(the)016:454: khyad par du gtum mo 'di yi spyod pa ni /
NK100(the)016:455: bud med la sogs pa thig le'i gnas su 'gyur pa thams cad spang /
NK100(the)016:456: me dang nyi ma dron po dang /
NK100(the)016:457: ngal dub kyi bya ba dang /
NK100(the)016:458: bsil rtsub grang bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas dang /
NK100(the)016:459: 'dus sems rnam pa g.yengs pa'i las dang /
NK100(the)016:460: lci zhing dro ba'i gos kyi can la sogs pa thams cad spang ngo //
NK100(the)016:461: dus rgyun du nges 'byung gi brtson 'grus bskyed don
NK100(the)016:462: bzhi'i man ngag gi bsgom pa la 'bad par bya'o
NK100(the)016:463: // kha zas bcud can bza' ba dang /
NK100(the)016:464: 'jam zhing yang pa'i ras gos gyon pa dang /
NK100(the)016:465: grib ma dang grang par 'dug pa dang /
NK100(the)016:466: dus rgyun du nyin gos dang mtshan gos gyon te /
NK100(the)016:467: de gnyis ni nub mo nyal khar rlung ste ma dang /
NK100(the)016:468: bcas pa lan bzhi bzung de ni nub gos so //
NK100(the)016:469: nang par langs khar rlung ste ma dang bcas pa lan bzhi gzung /
NK100(the)016:471: de gnyis ma chags par bsgoms gsung ngo //
NK100(the)016:472: gnyis pa gdam zhi gtad rgya la gnyis ste /
NK100(the)016:473: gtad pa dang mi nub par gdams pa'o //
NK100(the)016:475: chos kyi sku kun tu bzang po'i thugs la bdol nas /
NK100(the)016:476: longs sku'i rdo rje sems dpa' gtad /
NK100(the)016:477: des sprul pa'i sku phyag na rdo rje la gtad /
NK100(the)016:478: de nas rim pa bzhin brgyud nas //
NK100(the)016:479: rta ban rin chen dpal bzang po yan chad tu ma nor bar gtad pa'o //
NK100(the)016:480: mi nub par gdams pa ni /
NK100(the)016:482: ma rul par nyams su longs shig /ma zags par
NK100(the)016:483: gyis shig /ma chags par gyis shig /ma lhag par
NK100(the)016:484: gyis shig /ces gsungs nas gtad do //
NK100(the)016:485: gzhan yang snod med pa'i rten gyis gang zag la
NK100(the)016:486: snyan brgyud kyi gdams ngag khyad par can 'di ma
NK100(the)016:487: sbyin cig /snod dang ldan pa'i gang zag la snyan
NK100(the)016:488: rgyud kyi gdams ngag 'di byon cig gsung nas bla
NK100(the)016:489: ma gong ma rnams kyi gtad rgya yod pa yin
NK100(the)016:490: gsung ngo // de ltar lta sgom spyod gsum tshul
NK100(the)016:491: bzhin du nyams su len na ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK100(the)016:493: lus lto rgyab kyi 'khre ba chod nas 'gro ba
NK100(the)016:494: yin pas lta bsgom don gyis gtum mo zhes kyang
NK100(the)016:495: bya'o // 'di lta bu'i gdams ngag khyad par can 'di sbyor pa /
NK100(the)016:497: rjes gsum gyis nyams su len ste /
NK100(the)016:498: sbyor ba skyabs 'gro byang chub kyi sems kyis kun nas blangs /
NK100(the)016:499: dngos gzhi thabs shes rab zung 'jug tu bya /
NK100(the)016:500: rjes 'khor gsum mi dmigs par bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o //
NK100(the)016:501: snyan rgyud kyi gdams ngag /dbus pa rta yis yi
NK100(the)016:502: ge ris bkod pa rdzogs so ////bla ma'i man ngag
NK100(the)016:504: dad ldan blo gros snod du legs blugs te //
NK100(the)016:505: ting 'dzin nyams myong ldan pa'i bdud rtsis brgyan //
NK100(the)016:506: rta ban rin chen sems kyi bum pa nas //
NK100(the)016:507: rjes 'jug mos pa'i tsha gdung sel bar smon //
NK100(the)016:509: skal med rnams dang mi 'phrod shog //
NK100(the)016:510: gtum mo'i don bzhi'i man ngag 'di rta'i ban de rin chen dpal gyis /
NK100(the)016:511: chos tshul bzhin du mdzad pa'i bla ma rom po
NK100(the)016:512: ba chos kyi gzhon nu'i gsung la zin bris su
NK100(the)016:513: byas pa rdzogs so ////shin tu zab par 'dug pas
